DOC.brief_summary: A group of midwives and obstetric nurses have been trained to use circumferential abdominal pelvic pressure (CAPP) to treat postpartum hemorrhage. As part of the training follow up any use of a CAPP device will be monitored to identify complications.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Trial of the Circumferential Abdominal Pelvic Pressure Device (CAPP)
DOC.detailed_description: Providers will be surveyed twice at 4 and 8 months using open ended methods.
DOC.criteria: Any patient receiving CAPP during study period. None (CAPP is only clinically indicated for obstetric hemorrhage post delivery.
